RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI

RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI Class Reference

#include <globaluri.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class to get the uri of a page, according to the website adress or to get a directory.

If the macro WEBSITE_DEBUG is defined, we use a local website (127.0.0.1), otherwise, we use the production website (rainbru.free.fr).

Use getAdminAdress(const char*) to get an administration php file mostly used by the CurlSubmitForm interface. Use getXmlAdress(const char*) to get the adress of a xml files (used by CurlGetFileToXml).

This class is also used to get a local file. getShareFile(std::string) give the absolute name of a file in $PREFIX/share (i.e. /usr/local/share by default) and getUserDirFile(std::string) give a configuration file in the user's home directory.

GlobalURI makes sure some files are in the $HOME/.RainbruRPG/ by copying it from $PREFIX/share/conf/ if it does not exists. All this stuff is made by the homeSetup() method.
